thread.section_title: Starfire Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Starfire Direct | starfiredirect.com
thread.title: Irene Frankhouse
thread.title_full: Starfire Direct reviewed by Irene Frankhouse

author: Irene Frankhouse
title: Irene Frankhouse
text: I ordered 5 samples before I bought your fire glass to make sure it's what I was looking for and one of the samples was the 1/4 inch Pacific Blue which I loved. I ended up ordering 3 pounds and it wasn't at all the blue color I received in the little sample packet. All the other colors I ordered were fine. I wish I could get the blue that was sent to me in a sample
